author: hengne
body:
1.) adding new 2015C 25ns data workflows, including json file update, refer to branch: hengne:hengne:from-CMSSW_7_5_2_relval_newData_fullList
2.) update mixing/premixing inputs in RelVal scripts
3.) change to use the three new BPH workflows as requested by the BPH group.
title: relval scripts update and adding new 2015C 25ns data workflows
